solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int uniquePathsWithObstacles(int[][] obstacleGrid) {--newline--        int width = obstacleGrid[0].length;--newline--        int[] dp = new int[width];--newline--        dp[0] = 1;--newline--        for (int[] row : obstacleGrid) {--newline--            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {--newline--                if (row[j] == 1)--newline--                    dp[j] = 0;--newline--                else if (j > 0)--newline--                    dp[j] += dp[j - 1];--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return dp[width - 1];--newline--    }--newline--}
